page.title: 07Entertainment
page.content: There are many aspects of entertainment in Solihull. There are the plays, operas, musicals and musical entertainments in the Library Theatre. If you like films you would want to go to Solihull Cinema which shows all kinds of films. There is a night club called The Snooty Fox. It is open from Tuesday to Saturday 21.30 untill 02:00. It has disco music, two main bars and a cocktail bar. It is only open to people over twenty. The area also offers a conference, banqueting and exhibition centre which can cater for up to 1000 delegates and similar facilities can be found in the St.Johns Hotel, a very high class hotel. Every year in July the local round table organise a carnival for local charities. There is a parade and fair and thousands of pounds are raised.
